about_the_game:
Fluida is a simulation logic game where you can create your own beautiful stage with different items like Pipes, Pressure Valves, and Pressure Gauges for other people to solve.

Mix and match items to create something simple or go all out with complex designs—it’s up to you. When you’re happy with your creation, share it on the Steam Workshop. Others can play your levels, and you’ll see what they think of your skills.

Game Features

  • Level Editor, 40+ options to customize your level!

  • Custom Tutorials, create and share tutorials for Fluida on our Workshop!

  • Achievements, 14 Achievements for you to unlock!

  • 4 interactive tutorials, learn basics of creating levels in Fluida by completing these levels!

  • Workshop Support, download and upload your beautiful levels with the world!

  • Freedom, create anything you want, from a simple stage to a calculator, why not?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 2.8 GHz or higher (AMD Phenom II X4 925 or Intel i3-4130 or newer are recommended)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA graphic card, with at least 4GB of dedicated VRAM and with at least DirectX 11 and Shader Model 5.1 support: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon R9
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: AMD / Intel processor running at 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA graphic card, with at least 4GB of dedicated VRAM and with at least DirectX 11 and Shader Model 5.1 support: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon R9
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: Fluida is a simulation logic game where you can use many types of items like Pipes, Pressure Valves, Pressure Gauges and many more to create your own stage for other people to enjoy!
